channel.title: RotateX - Need staff and active community
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/4tp02e.png[/img] WE ARE ON A VPS SO WE ARE ONLINE 24/7
Website & Webclient
[URL=http://"http://rotatexrsps.com/downloads.html"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rotatexrsps.com/play.html"]Play now[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rotatexrsps.com/"]Forums[/URL]
About the Server.
RotateX is a brand new server, wich means that we are looking for staff ( dont expect to just enter the server and ask for it, you wont get it that way ), we have insured that you'll experience the best gameplay ever, some of the stuff we have are listed below it ain't all of what we got . We update the server daily wich means theres always something new entering the server! Come joins us now!
★ General Features ★ - 614 overlay/underlay flo! (New graphics) - 100% Clan chat, with setup and ranks! - 602 Animations no bugs! - Flawless Combat! - Updated 4-5 times through the day! - Fully updated graphics! - Flawless Monster/attacking/player clipping! - Mature staff! - Plenty of minigames! - Great Economy (This is very important to us! - Hours of content! - Flawless item switching! - All items have their correct bonuses! - 100% Money pouch - Nex maps + minions - all skills work! - Complete God Wars!
★ Monsters ★ - 100% King black dragon! - 100% Corporal beast! - 100% Bork! - 100% Duel arena! - 100% Polypore dungeon! - 100% Glacors! - 100% Frost Dragons! - 99% Castle wars! - 100% Npc clipped tiles! - 100% accurate monster stats bonueses! - 100% Dragons fire breath (Anti shield needed) - 100% Nex (Correct maps) - 100% Godwars with all bosses! - 100% Jad (Poll for adding all waves!) - Alot more, come see!
★ Combat System ★ - Flawsless system! - All bonuses are from the runescape wiki - Void bonus added. - Berserker necklake added. - magic's works flawlessy (including polypore staff)! - ranged works flawlessy!
★ Skills ★ - all 24 skills can be trained! - Hunter is added! - Farming is added! - Dungeoneering is added. - 100+ Summoning + Npc dialogues & Head models in tab - all skills works perfectly!
★ Information ★ We have made sure that you'll experience the best gameplay ever, we respect our players as much as the higher ranked players. We do not treat staff players better than regular players, you all mean the same to us! Follow the rules wich can be found on the forums, and you'll be good to go! Hope to see you in game!
★A Few Pictures★ 100% Current rs tele system [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/9923d0aca148db5132633f2019ede7a1.png[/img]
100% Nex [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e514a1d1bf90a6f366cdb6b7a55077d4.png[/img]
Castle Wars [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/1c2b0e2829464f73de8a8e632b4be9ae.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/258af79e45ca213e032e7961f9915e2c.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: RotateX - Need staff and active community
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Sorry but: http://i.gyazo.com/9923d0aca148db5132633f2019ede7a1.png isn’t 100%.
RuneScape added more area’s you can port to. Some of which you don’t have maps for
You won’t be having 100% for a while, mate.
See: http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Lodestone_Network &&

Also note: Saying you need a community is a really bad idea… The point of advertising is to get players… If they see you have little to none, by you blatantly advertising it, most won’t want to join.

One more thing. Post what makes your server different. Not what every other server has. I highly doubt you have “perfect combat and 100% skilling” too. Not even going to waste my time dl’ing to prove that.

Read full topic
item.source: RotateX - Need staff and active community
